maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/67.orig:
Oh my...\.
Look at this mess.\. The captain will surely not like this.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/67.text:
О, мой...\. 
Посмотри на этот беспорядок.\. Капитану наверняка это не понравится.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/67.orig: Jet runs a strictly regimented ship.\. Every room needs to be cleaned before work.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/67.text: Джет управляет строго регламентированным кораблëм.\. Каждая комната должна быть убрана перед работой.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/67.orig: I wonder how these guys managed to skip Jet's daily inspection.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/67.text: Интересно, как этим парням удалось пропустить ежедневную проверку Джета.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/10.orig: Oh! I thought they canceled this game!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/10.text: О! Я думал, что они отменили эту игру!

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/10.orig:
He seems pretty engaged with the game.\.
We should just let him play...
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/10.text:
Он, похоже, очень занят игрой.\.
Пусть играет...

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Oh!\. You must be the avatar the captain told us about.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Ой!\. Ты, должно быть, аватар, о котором говорил капитан.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Hi!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Привет!

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Well, feel free to check out the ship.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Ну, можешь свободно осматривать корабль.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: It's just one of the smaller ships of the Solar class but it does its job.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Это один из наименьших кораблей класса Solar, но он делает свою работу.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: But I suggest you don't go near the room across the hall...
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Правда, я советую тебе не ходить рядом с комнатой напротив...

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: So you checked out the room across the hall?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Так ты проверила комнату напротив?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: [nods]
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: [кивает]

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Don't mind it.\. Normally every room has to be clean.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Не обращай внимания.\. Обычно каждая комната должна быть убрана.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: But somehow she manages to get around captain Jet's inspections.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Но ей как-то удаётся обходить проверки капитана Джета.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Hi!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Привет!

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Oh! You're back!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Ой! Ты вернулась!

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: I didn't expect to see you again on this ship, to be honest.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Честно говоря, я не ожидал снова увидеть тебя на этом корабле.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Anyway, how was CrossWorlds so far? Was it fun?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: В любом случае, как там в CrossWorlds? Было весело?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Hm... Seems like you have mixed feelings about it.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Хм... Похоже, что у тебя смешанные чувства по этому поводу.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: [nods]
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: [кивает]

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Hi!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Привет!

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Oh!\. You're back on the ship!\. Haven't seen you for some time!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: О!\. Ты снова на корабле!\. Долго я тебя не видел!

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: I heard somebody mentioning that you have your own house in the Playground now!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Я слышал, кто-то говорил, что у тебя теперь свой дом в игровой зоне!

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Is that true?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Это правда?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: [nods]
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: [кивает]

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Whoa, that's cool!\. I suppose you have to play the game a lot to get something fancy like that.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Ух ты, это круто!\. Много, наверное, нужно играть, чтобы получить что-нибудь такое крутое.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Hey there, Lea.\. You better not keep the captain waiting.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Привет, Лея.\. Лучше не заставлять капитана ждать.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Wait, Carla... is this your room?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Подожди, Карла... это твоя комната?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Sure is.\. Something wrong with it?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Она самая.\. С ней что-то не так?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: How did you do it?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Как у тебя это получилось?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Do what?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Что получилось?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: This room.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Эта комната.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: I did nothing.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Я ничего не делала.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: I can see that...
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Именно это я и заметил...

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: I mean, how did Jet not see this... \! room?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Я имею в виду, как Джет не замечает эту... \!комнату?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Ahh, I see.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Ааа, поняла.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Well, you'll have to wait for another time to hear my secrets I guess.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Ну, может быть, как-нибудь в другой раз, я и поделюсь своим секретом.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Better go to the bridge, the cap' wants to show Lea some new tricks as soon as possible.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Лучше идите на мостик, кэп хочет показать Лее новые трюки как можно скорее.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: [nods]
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: [кивает]

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: What? You are not curious, Lea?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Что? Тебе не любопытно, Лея?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Well, I guess we should go then...
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Тогда, я думаю, мы должны пойти туда...

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Hey there, Lea.\. You better not keep the Captain waiting.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Привет, Лея.\. Лучше не заставлять капитана ждать.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: [nods]
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: [кивает]

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Oh! Hey, Lea! Did you have a look around the ship already?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Ой! Привет, Лея! Ты уже осмотрела корабль?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Hi!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Привет!

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Lea, girl! Back on the M.S. Solar?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Лея, подруга! Вернулась на M.S. Solar?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: [nods]
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: [кивает]

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Well I hope things are going fine in the Playground?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Ну, я надеюсь, в игровой зоне всё в порядке?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Nothing too special happening here. Just shipping around stuff as usual.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Здесь-то ничего особенного не происходит. Просто плаваем по разным местам, как всегда.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Hi!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Привет!

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Lea, girl!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Лея, подруга!

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Hope you're having a good time over at the Playground!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Надеюсь, ты хорошо проводишь время в игровой зоне!

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: One moment, Carla!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Одну секунду, Карла!

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Oh!\. You're here as well, Sergey?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Ой!\. Ты тоже здесь, Сергей?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: I figured it out!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Я это выяснил!

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Figured what out?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Что выяснил?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: The reason why you can keep your room as messy as it is, without Jet saying anything!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Причину, по которой ты можешь держать свою комнату в таком беспорядке, и Джет не говорит ни слова!

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Wha...?
Oh my gosh!\. That old story!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: О Боже!\. Эта старая история!

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Damn, when was it you asked me about that?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Чёрт, когда же ты меня об этом спрашивал?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Must've been ages ago!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Наверное, сто лет назад!

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Yes...\. And I have never quite forgotten about it.\. Even Jet himself would not tell me why.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Да...\. И я никогда не забывал об этом.\. Даже сам Джет не скажет мне почему.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Talk about dedication!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Ну и преданность!

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: So, let's hear it!\. What's my secret?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Ну, давай послушаем!\. Что у меня за секрет?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Jet... hates water.\. He cannot swim.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Джет... ненавидит воду.\. Он не умеет плавать.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: That is why he wears that jetpack all the time.\. It suddenly all makes sense.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Вот почему он всегда носит этот реактивный ранец.\. Внезапно всё встало на свои места.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: That's right...
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Так и есть...

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: And he's very self conscious about it, so I'd ask you to not share that information any further.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: И он очень стесняется этого, так что я бы попросила тебя больше не распространять эту информацию.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Of course...
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Конечно...

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: But...\. am I really understanding this correctly?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Но...\. я действительно правильно понимаю?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Did you actually blackmail Jet with this information?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Ты в самом деле шантажировала Джета этой информацией?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Blackmailing?\. Hell no!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Шантажировала?\. Да ни в коем случае!

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Really Sergey, what do you take me for...
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Серьёзно, Сергей, за кого ты меня принимаешь...

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Uhm...
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Эмм...

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: We just found an agreement.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Мы просто пришли к соглашению.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: I told him that I need my place to be this way to really concentrate on my work.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Я сказала ему, что мне нужно моё место в таком виде, чтобы по-настоящему сосредоточиться на моей работе.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: And I wouldn't ask him to take off his jetpack either, you see?\. It's actually a bit of a safety hazard.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Я не стала бы просить его снять свой реактивный ранец, понимаешь?\. Это ведь и правда в каком-то смысле мера предосторожности.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Well...\. alright.\. I suppose it is not...\. quite...\. blackmailing?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Ну...\. ладно.\. Полагаю, это не...\. совсем...\. шантаж?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: It totally isn't!\. We simply accept each other and our quirks!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Совсем нет!\. Мы просто принимаем друг друга со всеми причудами!

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Alright!\. At least I now understand!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Хорошо!\. По крайней мере, теперь я понял!

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: That Sergey never forgets, does he?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Этот Сергей никогда не забывает, да?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: This is weird...
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Это странно...

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: How does Carla do it?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Как у Карлы это получается?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: I will find out...
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Я выясню...

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Someday.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Когда-нибудь.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Why did you wrap her in a blanket?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Зачем ты завернула её в одеяло?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: She's an avatar, she shouldn't feel cold or anything like that...
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Она аватар и не должна чувствовать холод и всё в таком роде...

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: She just looked like she needed this, alright? Stop nagging.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Она просто выглядела так, будто ей это необходимо, понятно? Хватит болтать.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Lea, my girl! You're back!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Лея, девочка моя! Ты вернулась!
...Привет...

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Poor thing...\. you look like you've been through hell.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Бедняжка...\. ты выглядишь так, будто в аду побывала.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: You two, we'd like to talk to the lass in private.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Вы двое, мы бы хотели поговорить с девчушкой наедине.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Aye captain!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Да, капитан!

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Sergey, ye've got some explainin' to do!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Сергей, тебе нужно объясниться!

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: What in the bloody hell has been goin' on with you two?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Что, чёрт возьми, с вами двумя происходит?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Ending up in that place and all.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Подумать только, вы оказались в этом месте.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Yes...\. it is about time I tell you everything I know.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Да...\. самое время рассказать вам всё, что я знаю.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: But first...
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Но сначала...

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Let me apologize to you, Lea...
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Позволь мне извиниться перед тобой, Лея...

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: I deceived you, telling you this lie about yourself and your past...
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Я тебя обманул, все эти рассказы о тебе и твоём прошлом...

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: ...Why?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: ...Почему?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: I just thought it would be for the best...
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Я просто думал, что так будет лучше...

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: But in all honesty, I did not know what to do.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Но, честно говоря, я не знал, что делать.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: ...Why?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: ...Почему?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: It is because of... what you are.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Это всё из-за того... чем ты являешься.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Shizuka...\. she was right.\. You are an \c[3]artificial intelligence\c[0].
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Шизука...\. она была права.\. Ты \c[3]искусственный интеллект\c[0].

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: More precisely, you are what Satoshi liked to call... an \c[3]Evotar\c[0].
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Точнее, ты - то, что Сатоши любил называть \c[3]эвотар\c[0].

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.orig: Let me start from the beginning.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/13.text: Позвольте мне начать с самого начала.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: So, yes... that is what you are, Lea. An \c[3]Evotar\c[0] based on \c[3]Shizuka\c[0].
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Так что да... этим ты и являешься, Лея. \c[3]Эвотаром\c[0], основанным на \c[3]Шизуке\c[0].

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Your personality and memories are a copy of hers.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Твоя личность и воспоминания являются её копией.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: And... that is also why I did not want to tell you the truth.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: И... вот почему я не хотел говорить тебе правду.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Back in the day... Satoshi discovered that Evotars had problems handling the truth about themselves.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Ещё тогда... Сатоши обнаружил, что у эвотаров имеются проблемы с восприятием правды о себе.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: To have the memories of your human self, and then to discover that you are in fact an AI...
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Иметь человеческие воспоминания и осознавать, что на самом деле ты всего лишь искусственный интеллект...

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: It is a massive emotional shock that the system usually could not handle... leading to \c[3]permanent malfunction\c[0].
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Это огромный эмоциональный шок, с которым система обычно не может справиться... что приводит к \c[3]непоправимым сбоям\c[0].

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Fortunately, that did not happen to you.\. It seems you...\. accepted the truth.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: К счастью, с тобой этого не случилось.\. Кажется, ты...\. приняла правду.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: [nods]
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: [кивает]

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Again... I am sorry for all of this.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Ещё раз... Прошу прощения за всё это.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Things might have been easier if I told you right away... or it could have been an early end to everything.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Всё могло быть проще, если бы я сразу сказал тебе... ну, или на этом бы всё и закончилось.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: I just could not know what would happen... so I tried to be careful to minimize the risk.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Я просто не знал, что произойдёт... поэтому старался быть осторожным, хотел свести риск к минимуму.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: So wait...\. did you actually tell her the coma story?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Подожди...\. ты реально рассказал ей историю про кому?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: ...Yes?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Ну да...

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Seriously?! I told you that one would be too dramatic.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Серьёзно?! Я же говорила тебе, что это будет чересчур драматично.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: It...\. It was the most logical option, though...
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Это...\. Это было самое логичное решение, как мне казалось...

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Really now...?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Действительно...?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Did I understand that right, Sergey?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Я правильно понял, Сергей?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: There are these... \c[3]Evotars\c[0] in CrossWorlds?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: В CrossWorlds есть эти... \c[3]эвотары\c[0]?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: And they copy the personality and memories of players?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: И они копируют личность и воспоминания игроков?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: That is the other thing...\. there really should not be any Evotars in CrossWorlds at all.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Дело как раз в другом...\. на самом деле в CrossWorlds не должно быть никаких эвотаров.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: All I know is that they found \c[3]someone\c[0] that supported their continued research on Evotars.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Всё, что я знаю, это то, что они нашли \c[3]кого-то\c[0], кто поддержал их дальнейшее исследование эвотаров.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: They even wanted me to join them...\. but I declined.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Они даже хотели, чтобы я присоединился к ним...\. но я отказался.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: That whole endeavor... it seemed very risky to me.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Всё это начинание... казалось мне очень рискованным.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Anyway, it was not long afterwards that I entirely \c[3]lost contact\c[0] with them.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Так или иначе, вскоре я полностью \c[3]утратил связь\c[0] с ними.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: I had not heard from them for years.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Ничего не слышал о них годами.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: That was until recently... when I \c[3]discovered Lea\c[0], hidden within the game's database.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Так было до недавнего времени... пока я не \c[3]обнаружил Лею\c[0], спрятанную в базе данных игры.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: And that is how the whole thing started.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Вот так всё это и началось.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: I took some time off from work and logged Lea into the game... looking for \c[3]answers\c[0].
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Я взял небольшой отпуск на работе и подключил Лею к игре... в поисках \c[3]ответов\c[0].

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: I know as much.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Это всё мне и так известно.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: So how did ye end up in that place?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Так как же вы оказались в том месте?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Well... that is where things started to become strange.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Ну... здесь и начинаются все странности.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: We were pulled into an area that was not supposed to be part of the official Playground... \c[3]Vermillion Wasteland\c[0].
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Нас затянуло в область, которая не является частью официальной игровой зоны... \c[3]Пустошь Вермиллион\c[0].

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: \c[3]Gautham\c[0] and \c[3]Shizuka\c[0]...\. they were both there.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: \c[3]Гаутам\c[0] и \c[3]Шизука\c[0]...\. они оба были там.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: And then there was this \c[3]masked person\c[0] we saw on the last day.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: И ещё был этот \c[3]человек в маске\c[0], которого мы видели в тот день.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: But \c[3]Satoshi\c[0]...\. he was nowhere to be found.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Но \c[3]Сатоши\c[0]...\. его нигде не было видно.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: We were close...\. really close to the answers.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Мы были близки...\. очень близки к ответам.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Yet... we could not afford to stay there. It was too \c[3]dangerous\c[0].
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: И тем не менее... мы не могли позволить себе оставаться там. Это было бы слишком \c[3]опасно\c[0].

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: How come?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: С чего это вдруг?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Somebody with administrative access to that area was \c[3]tracking my connection\c[0].
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Кто-то с административным доступом к этой области \c[3]отслеживал моё соединение\c[0].

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: They tried to \c[3]locate\c[0] me... and almost succeeded.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Они пытались \c[3]вычислить\c[0] моё местоположение... и почти успешно.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: I just barely escaped it by minimizing communication with Lea over the last few days.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Я с трудом избежал этого, сведя к минимуму общение с Леей в последние несколько дней.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: In the end...\. we just had to escape.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: В итоге...\. нам просто пришлось сбежать.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: I see...
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Понятно...

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Man, that really is a lot to take in, y'know?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Мда, это действительно сложно для понимания.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: How about we take a little break?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Может, немного передохнём?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Lea? Maybe a little stroll around the ship would help you to loosen up a bit?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Лея? Может, небольшая прогулка по кораблю поможет тебе расслабиться?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Surely that's no problem, right Cap?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Наверняка это не проблема, верно, Кэп?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: I sure don't like ye deciding that by yerself...
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Мне как-то не очень нравится, что ты сама тут принимаешь решения...

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: But sure, it's alright.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Но хорошо, я не против.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Great! Then how about you show Lea around a bit?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Отлично! Тогда как насчёт того, чтобы вы провели для Леи небольшую экскурсию?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Why am I now...\.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: С чего бы вдруг я...\.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Please, I'd just like to have a little word with Sergey for a moment.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Пожалуйста, я бы хотела немного переговорить с Сергеем.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Fine.\. Follow me, lass.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Хорошо.\. Следуй за мной, девчушка.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Carla? Is something the matter?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Карла? Что-то случилось?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Mister, I got a question for you!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Мистер, у меня есть к вам вопрос!

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Something the poor girl is probably worrying about.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Тот, о котором бедная девочка, возможно, переживает.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: ...Yes?
Once you find Satoshi and everything has been cleared up...
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Как только ты найдёшь Сатоши и всё прояснится...

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: ...what will happen to her?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: ...что будет с ней?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Hi!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Привет!

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Ahh, there she is!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Ааа, вот и она!

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Whoa there, girl!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Ух ты, подруга!

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: You're much lighter than I expected!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Да ты куда легче, чем я ожидала!

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Lea, do not hug real people like that!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Лея, не обнимайся так с настоящими людьми!

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Your instant matter might break!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Мнимая материя может повредиться!

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Sorry!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Прости!

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: The wee lass sure got clingy!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Девчонка-то цепкая стала!

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Yes...\. she tends to do that a lot these days.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Да...\. Она часто так делает в последнее время.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Let the girl have her hugs!\. It really has been a long time, y'know?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Да пусть обнимается сколько вздумается!\. Уж ведь и правда столько времени прошло!

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: I heard things are going really well over at the Playground.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Я слышала, в игровой зоне всё очень хорошо продвигается.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Ya got your own little village now, isn't that right?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: У тебя там своя собственная деревенька есть, не так ли?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: [nods]
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: [кивает]

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: I really wish we could pay a visit, but we're all still very busy around here.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Хотелось бы, чтобы мы могли прийти в гости, но у нас здесь всё ещё очень много дел.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Aye.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Так точно.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Lot to do ever since construction on the \c[3]new game\c[0] started.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Много дел с тех пор, как началось создание \c[3]новой игры\c[0].

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Hush...\. that is not supposed to be public yet.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Тсссс...\. это пока ещё не публичная информация.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: But yes.\. Instatainment is working on a successor to CrossWorlds right now.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Но да.\. Instatainment прямо сейчас работает над продолжением CrossWorlds.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: I suppose it is fine if you know about it.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Я думаю, что ничего не будет, если ты обо всём узнаешь.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: After all, you are unlikely to spread the news.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Тем более что из тебя такая себе сплетница.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Looks like we'll have to take a few dozen more trips over the sea.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Кажется, нам придется совершить ещё с десяток путешествий по морю.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: What of it?\. Otherwise we'd be shippin' things elsewhere.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: И что с того?\. Иначе мы бы доставляли вещи ещё куда-нибудь.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: You have been on this moon for quite some time now.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Ты уже довольно долгое время на этой планете.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Do you not miss the old days working in intergalactic logistics?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Не скучаешь по тем временам, когда ты работал в межгалактической логистике?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Nah...\. I'm used to all the water by now.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Не...\. я уже попривык к воде.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: What?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Что?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Oh, ya didn't know, Lea?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Ой, так ты не знала, Лея?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: The cap used to work on a \c[3]spaceship\c[0].
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Капитан работал на \c[3]космическом корабле\c[0].

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Aye.\. Shippin' things through the \c[3]sea of stars\c[0].
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Так точно.\. Возил всякое чрез \c[3]звёздные моря\c[0].

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: It's not as excitin' as it sounds.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Это не так захватывает, как оно может показаться.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: A clear night sky like this...\. It has always impressed me.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Ясное ночное небо...\. Оно всегда поражало меня.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: A boundless sea of stars...
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Бескрайнее море звёзд...

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: ...a boundless sea of stars.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: ...бескрайнее море звёзд.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: When you see it, you start to realize...\. just how insignificant we are to this world.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Когда ты видишь его, ты начинаешь понимать...\. насколько ничтожны мы в этом мире.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Why?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Почему?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: [shakes head]
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: [мотает головой]

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Is everything okay, Lea?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Всё в порядке, Лея?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: You are probably tired.\. It has been a long day for you, correct?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Похоже, ты устала.\. У тебя выдался тяжёлый день, не так ли?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: [nods]
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: [кивает]

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Well...\. you have a warm bed to return to.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Ну...\. у тебя есть тёплая постель.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: It is time for me to leave as well, actually.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Мне тоже пора уже уходить.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: It was really nice to see you all again!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Было очень приятно увидеться с вами снова!

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: The pleasure was all ours!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Нам тоже!

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Aye.\. Still, never would have guessed I'd meet you in this kind of get-up.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Так точно.\. И всё же, никогда бы не подумал, что запечатлю тебя в таком виде.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: That is what games are for, correct?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Ну так для того игры и созданы, верно?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Doing things in unusual ways.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Чтобы всё делать необычно.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Until next time!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: До скорого!

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Logout
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Выход из игры

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Alright.\. Time to get back to work!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Что же.\. Пора возвращаться к работе!

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: You're always welcome on this ship, girl.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Ты всегда желанный гость на этом корабле, подруга.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: We already decided to just keep that teleporter down in the cargo hold!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Мы уже решили просто оставить тот телепорт в грузовом отсеке!

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: See ya around!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Увидимся!

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Bye!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Пока!

maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.orig: Time to \c[3]go to bed\c[0] in your house in \c[3]Homestedt\c[0]!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json/entities/14.text: Пришло время \c[3]лечь спать\c[0] в вашем доме в \c[3]Хоумштадте\c[0]!
